context: "Maailma" is a case form of the Estonian word "maailm" (world). It can be interpreted in different ways depending on the grammatical context: as the genitive singular meaning 'world's' or 'of the world', as the partitive singular meaning '(some) of the world', or as the illative singular meaning 'into the world'. The dictionary examples show it used in expressions referring to burdens, complexities, and matters concerning the world.
